A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Lets put it this way : 
The visuals \, the cinematography and the sound was fucking great. 
the rest ? utter shit. the luke story totally  totally ignores the actual luke character we known for 3 movies\, books \, and a few games. rey is essentially more powerful then anikin or sidious ever have been WITHOUT TRAINING ! she literally is like. let put it this way\, she didnt know about the force like days ago. and now can split mountains and have visions and shit right a fucking way. 
the force got totally made up on the fly. like it makes no sense. but fuck it . 
teleportation is teleportaion . fuck it. 
ah . and snoke just does. that epic fucking badass dark force user\, who was all the epic mystery. just dies. he has 10 min of screen time. 
oh yeah. the first few slapstick homour scenes ? pretty much force awakens. 
but after that its gets to the point where its just cringy as fuck. 
also fuck the casino part. its dumb. pointless. like phasma. and other shit in this movie. half of the movie is irrelevant to the actual plot and characters. 
also rey and kylo swap motivations and characters so much in this movie it gives you brain damg. 

all in all. i walked out after snokes death . said fuck you movie and left. the 1 and a half stars for the visuals and sound.
